description_html:
A collaboration with the lifestyle design brand Art of Board. This collection embodies the creative spirit, freedom and individuality of the skating culture. The art forms found on reclaimed skateboard decks have been reimagined by the Stinson Studio and transformed into performance textiles. Infectiously playful, capturing the chaotic energy of the street , the Art of Board collection is truly a beautiful rebellion!

All Art of Board collection patterns are GREENGUARD Certified

4 Textiles / 21 colors
